title: Kaanita's spinach omelette
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '15g chopped spinach', '2 tablespoons chopped spring onions', '1 green chilli, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped onions (optional)', '2 teaspoons soft cheese', '3 to 4 tablespoons milk', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
